stimulusHtml: Which of the following was a direct outcome of the Three-Fifths Compromise?
choicesHtml: The number of senators increased in three-fifths of the states with enslaved populations.
Amendments to the United States Constitution required three-fifths of the states to approve.
The presidential winner would be determined by three-fifths of the electors in the Electoral College.
A formula for calculating a stateâ€™s enslaved population for the purposes of representation was enacted.
